member.name: M:ChameleonForms.HtmlAttributes.#ctor(System.Func{System.Object,System.Object}[])
member.summary: Constructs a object using lambda methods to express the attributes.
member.example: var h = new HtmlAttributes(style => "width: 100%;", cellpadding => 0, @class => "class1 class2", src => "http://url/", data_somedata => "\"rubbi&h\"");
member.param: A list of lambas where the lambda variable name is the name of the attribute and the value is the value

member.summary: Constructs a object using a dictionary to express the attributes.

member.param: A dictionary of attributes

member.name: M:ChameleonForms.HtmlAttributes.#ctor(System.Object)
member.summary: Constructs a object using an anonymous object to express the attributes.

member.param: An anonymous object of attributes
